title: The Buzz of rock and roll
creator_credit: Dale Lynch and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
brief_description: Documentary about three Australian musicians who are also tinnitus sufferers- Fiona Horne (DefFX), Rod Ling (July Fourteenth) and Richard Pleasance (Boom Crash Opera). Tinnitus is a condition that causes ringing in the ears and affects one in five people.
